original_text: And her lord rose up in the morning, and opened the doors of the house, and went out to go his way: and, behold, the woman his concubine was fallen down at the door of the house, and her hands were upon the threshold.
korean_text: 그의 주인이 일찍이 일어나 집 문을 열고 떠나고자 하더니 그 여인이 집 문에 엎드러져 있고 그의 두 손이 문지방에 있는 것을 보고

sentences.original_text: And her lord rose up in the morning,
and opened the doors of the house,
and went out to go his way:
the woman his concubine was fallen down
at the door of the house,
and her hands were upon the threshold.
